panel.label: Sounds
panel.name: Media Sounds Panel

check_box.name: collisions_audio_play_btn
check_box.tool_tip: Check this to hear default sounds from collisions
check_box.label: Play sounds from collisions

check_box.name: gesture_audio_play_btn
check_box.tool_tip: Check this to hear sounds from gestures
check_box.label: Play sounds from gestures

check_box.name: FSAutoUnmuteAmbient
check_box.label: Ambient
check_box.tool_tip: Automatically unmute Ambient after teleporting, if muted (default: off)

check_box.name: FSAutoUnmuteSounds
check_box.label: Sound Effects
check_box.tool_tip: Automatically unmute Sound Effects after teleporting, if muted (default: off)

panel.text: Play a sound when my friends:

text.name: money_change_threshold_label
text.tool_tip: Plays a sound when money is spent or received higher then the amount set here.

check_box.name: media_allowscript_btn
check_box.tool_tip: This settings allows / disallows scripted prims from controlling your media connections
check_box.label: Allow inworld scripts to play media

check_box.name: media_show_on_others_btn
check_box.tool_tip: Uncheck this to hide media attached to other avatars nearby
check_box.label: Play media attached to other avatars

check_box.name: media_filter
check_box.tool_tip: Check this to enable the filter that allows you to choose whether to play media from a specific host
check_box.label: Enable media filter (increased security)

slider.label: Starts getting quieter at:
slider.name: MediaRollOffMin
slider.tool_tip: Minimum distance from the source for rolloff to begin taking effect.

slider.label: Completely disappears at:
slider.name: MediaRollOffMax
slider.tool_tip: Maximum distance from the source for rolloff to completely mute the sound.

check_box.name: audio_auto_play_btn
check_box.tool_tip: Check this to automatically start audio streams.
check_box.label: Allow audio streams to auto-play

check_box.name: FSFadeAudioStream
check_box.tool_tip: Check this if fading should be used when the parcel audio stream changes
check_box.label: Enable Parcel Audio Fading:

slider.label: Fade in:
slider.name: FSAudioMusicFadeIn
slider.tool_tip: Audio fade in time for parcel audio.

slider.label: Fade out:
slider.name: FSAudioMusicFadeOut
slider.tool_tip: Audio fade out time for parcel audio.

check_box.label: Allow Voice in multiple viewer instances simultaneously
check_box.name: VoiceMultiInstance

radio_item.label: Hear Nearby Voices at full volume (Open Sim Only)

check_box.label: Show voice visualizers over avatars
check_box.tool_tip: Shows Voice Indicator (white dot) over avatars
check_box.name: FSShowVoiceVisualizer

check_box.label: Show voice visualizer over my own avatar
check_box.name: FSShowMyOwnVoiceVisualizer

check_box.label: Show the dot as part of the voice visualizer
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the dot is shown as part of the voice visualizer. If disabled, it only shows voice waves.
check_box.name: FSShowVoiceVisualizerWithDot

check_box.label: Show voice visualizers in calls
check_box.tool_tip: Shows Voice Indicator and move lips in world while being in private and group calls
check_box.name: Show_Voice_Visualizers_In_Calls

check_box.label: Show voice channel state in conversation tabs
check_box.tool_tip: Shows the current voice channel state in the tabs in the conversations window
check_box.name: FSShowConversationVoiceStateIndicator

check_box.label: Automatically reject all incoming group voice calls
check_box.name: VoiceCallsRejectGroup

check_box.label: Automatically reject all incoming conference (ad-hoc) voice calls
check_box.name: VoiceCallsRejectAdHoc

check_box.label: Automatically reject all incoming P2P (avatar with avatar) voice calls
check_box.name: VoiceCallsRejectP2P

check_box.label: Toggle speak on/off when I press button in toolbar
check_box.name: push_to_talk_toggle_check
check_box.tool_tip: When in toggle mode, press and release the trigger key ONCE to switch your microphone on or off. When not in toggle mode, the microphone broadcasts your voice only while the trigger is being held down.

slider_bar.name: mic_volume_slider
slider_bar.tool_tip: Change the volume using this slider

panel.label: UI Sounds 1
panel.name: UI Sounds tab 1
panel.text: Here you can change (by providing sound UUIDs), enable or disable default interface sounds. Hover your mouse cursor over UUID field to show its default value.

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on default Firestorm alerts.
text.name: textFSSndAlert

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on invalid keystroke.
text.name: textFSBadKeystroke

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on mouse button click.
text.name: textFSClick

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on mouse button release.
text.name: textFSClickRelease

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when female avatar takes damage.
text.name: textFSHealthReductionF

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when male avatar takes damage.
text.name: textFSHealthReductionM

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on money balance decrease.
text.name: textFSMoneyChangeDown

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on money balance increase.
text.name: textFSMoneyChangeUp

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on incoming instant message. This setting is shared with Chat > Notifications > 'When receiving Instant Messages'.
text.name: textFSNewIncomingIMSession

combo_box.item.label: Play only if not in focus

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on incoming group instant message. This setting is shared with Chat > Notifications > 'When receiving Group Instant Messages'.
text.name: textFSNewGroupIncomingIMSession

combo_box.item.label: Play only if not in focus

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on incoming conference instant message. This setting is shared with Chat > Notifications > 'When receiving ad-hoc Instant Messages'.
text.name: textFSNewConferenceIncomingIMSession

combo_box.item.label: Play only if not in focus

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when starting new IM session.
text.name: textFSStartIM

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on new object creation.
text.name: textFSObjectCreate

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on object deletion.
text.name: textFSObjectDelete

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on object rezzing.
text.name: textFSObjectRezIn

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on object derezzing.
text.name: textFSObjectRezOut

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played when taking snapshot. This setting is shared with 'Quiet Snapshots' option from Advanced menu.
text.name: textFSSnapshot

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on teleporting. This setting is shared with Move and View > Movement > 'Play sound effect when teleporting'.
text.name: textFSTeleportOut

panel.label: UI Sounds 2
panel.name: UI Sounds tab 2
panel.text: Here you can change (by providing sound UUIDs), enable or disable default interface sounds. Hover your mouse cursor over UUID field to show its default value.

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when Pie Menu appears.
text.name: textFSPieMenuAppear

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when Pie Menu disappears.
text.name: textFSPieMenuHide

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 1.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight0

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 2.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight1

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 3.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight2

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 4.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight3

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 5.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight4

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 6.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight5

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 7.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight6

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when selecting pie menu item 8.
text.name: textFSPieMenuSliceHighlight7

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when starting to type a chat message. This setting is shared with Chat > General > 'Hear typing sound when people type in nearby chat'.
text.name: textFSTyping

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when closing a window.
text.name: textFSWindowClose

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when opening a window.
text.name: textFSWindowOpen

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when script opens a dialog window.
text.name: textFSScriptFloaterOpen

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when your friend comes online.
text.name: textFSFriendOnline

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when your friend goes offline.
text.name: textFSFriendOffline

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on friendship offer.
text.name: textFSFriendshipOffer

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on teleport offer.
text.name: textFSTeleportOffer

panel.label: UI Sounds 3
panel.name: UI Sounds tab 3
panel.text: Here you can change (by providing sound UUIDs), enable or disable default interface sounds. Hover your mouse cursor over UUID field to show its default value.

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on inventory offer.
text.name: textFSInventoryOffer

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on incoming voice call.
text.name: textFSIncomingVoiceCall

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on group invitation.
text.name: textFSGroupInvitation

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on group notice.
text.name: textFSGroupNotice

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on new Experience notifications.
text.name: textFSQuestionExperience

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on invalid operations.
text.name: textFSInvalidOp

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on toggling movelock.
text.name: textFSMovelockToggle

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played on default footsteps. Change requires restart to take effect.
text.name: textFSFootsteps

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when the tracker beacon is active. It is more frequent when the avatar is closer to the destination.
text.name: textFSTrackerBeacon

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when the region restart alert appears.
text.name: textFSRestart

text.tool_tip: Sound UUID played, when the region restart alert appears (OpenSim).
text.name: textFSRestartOpenSim
